response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present an extraordinary opportunity for you to acquire a product that holds immense value for me. This unique item is not just an object but a symbol of excellence and quality, worth over $1,500,000 to me. I am confident it could hold significant value for you as well, given its exceptional craftsmanship and rarity.

I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price, reflecting my desire to share its magnificence with someone who appreciates it as much as I do. My initial offer is set at $1,400,000, which I believe is a fair and generous price considering its true worth.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I am more than happy to provide additional information to help you make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice", "product_price": 1400000}
